question: The global information technology (IT) delivery centre is coming up in which of the following place?
explanation: A global information technology (IT) delivery centre is coming up in jaipur to provide the ease of doing business to the engineering, architectural and professional companies in their international operations.It has been specially designed to cater to the changing dynamics of the business world. It is set up with an investment of Rs.100 crore, is expected to give employment to about 1,100 engineers, architects and IT and other professionals.
